author: Julia Manchester
title: Biden: I'm most concerned about misinformation during coronavirus crisis
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden said in an interview Tuesday that his top concern during the coronavirus crisis is the dissemination of misinformation about the virus."The number one thing I'm most concerned about,...
